other_title: ポケットモンスターベストウイッシュ
opening_theme: "Best Wishes! (ベストウイッシュ！)" by Rica Matsumoto
ending_theme: #1: "Fanfare of the Heart 「心のファンファーレ」" by Aki Okui (eps 1-25)

#4: "Mite Mite ☆ Kocchicchi (みてみて☆こっちっち)" by Momoiro Clover Z (eps 79-84)
